text: Gordon Astall (22 September 1927 – 21 October 2020) was an English professional footballer. He played as an outside right, and represented the Football League, the England B team and the full England side. In later life, he was diagnosed with dementia. He died in October 2020 at the age of 93. ==Honours== Plymouth Argyle * Third Division South: 1951–52 Birmingham City * Second Division: 1954–55 * FA Cup finalist: 1955–56 * Inter-Cities Fairs Cup finalist: 1958–60 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Footballers from Manchester Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players
title: Gordon Astall
